channel.title: Braxton County Office of Emergency Services | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/BraxtonOES/

item.title: Don't forget to mark your calendar!
item.description: Don't forget to mark your calendar!

item.title: REMINDER, School has started, watch for children crossing th
item.description: REMINDER, School has started, watch for children crossing the road. REMEMBER, if the lights are flashing, don't go passing.
